Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for image format control features.
Category.Description: Category for image format control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: CounterAndTimerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.

Category.Name: Debug
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Debug features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Debug features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Category.Name: EncoderControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Encoder Control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Encoder Control features.

Category.Name: FrequencyConverterControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Frequency Converter features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Frequency Converter features.

Category.Name: ShadingCorrection
Category.ToolTip: Includes items used to control the operation of the camera's shading correction.
Category.Description: Includes items used to control the operation of the camera's shading correction.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport layer control features.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Integer.Name: MaximumDeviceResponseTime
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum response time in ms.
Integer.Description: Maximum time until a device sends a response upon a received command not including the time needed to send the response over the link in ms..

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestTableAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the Manifest Table.
Integer.Description: Address of the Manifest Table.

Integer.Name: DeviceSBRMAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the Technology Specific Bootstrap Register Map.
Integer.Description: Address of the Technology Specific Bootstrap Register Map.

Boolean.Name: DeviceHeartbeatEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable the heartbeat.
Boolean.Description: Disables the heartbeat.

Integer.Name: DeviceHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Heartbeat Timeout in ms.
Integer.Description: Heartbeat Timeout in ms.

Integer.Name: DeviceMessageChannelID
Integer.ToolTip: channel_id used for the message channel.
Integer.Description: channel_id used for the message channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Current device time in ns.
Integer.Description: Current device time in ns.

Integer.Name: DeviceTimestampIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp increment in ns/tick.
Integer.Description: Timestamp increment in ns/tick.

Integer.Name: DeviceAccessPrivilege
Integer.ToolTip: Access Privilege.
Integer.Description: Access Privilege.

Integer.Name: DeviceProtocolEndianess
Integer.ToolTip: Endianess of the protocol implementation.
Integer.Description: Endianess of the protocol implementation.

Integer.Name: DeviceImplementationEndianess
Integer.ToolTip: Endianess of the device implementation.
Integer.Description: Endianess of the device implementation.

Integer.Name: DeviceUptime
Integer.ToolTip: Time of Device boot.
Integer.Description: Time of Device boot.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.
Integer.Description: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceConnectionStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Float.Name: DeviceCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link. This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent on that link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceClockSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Cameralink
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.
EnumEntry.Description: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceClockFrequency
Enumeration.ToolTip: Set the frequency of the selected Clock.
Enumeration.Description: Set the frequency of the selected Clock.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceClockFrequency_85M
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.
EnumEntry.Description: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceClockFrequency_70M
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.
EnumEntry.Description: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceClockFrequency_60M
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.
EnumEntry.Description: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its initial state and default settings.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its initial state and default settings.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: SensorTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of taps of the camera sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Number of taps of the camera sensor.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Enumeration.Description: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).

IntSwissKnife.Name: HeightMax_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX % UNIT ) ? ( MAX - ( MAX) % UNIT ) : ( MAX)

IntSwissKnife.Name: WidthMax_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX % UNIT ) ? ( MAX - ( MAX) % UNIT ) : ( MAX )

IntSwissKnife.Name: HeightMin_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX % UNIT ) ? ( MAX - ( MAX) % UNIT ) : ( MAX)

IntSwissKnife.Name: WidthMin_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX % UNIT ) ? ( MAX - ( MAX) % UNIT ) : ( MAX )

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.

Enumeration.Name: RegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the usage of the Region.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the usage of the Region.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Group.Integer: Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data. Line Pitch Expert LinePitch_Inq RW LinePitch_Reg B<-->

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flip.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseScanDirection
Boolean.ToolTip: select scan direction reverse or not.
Boolean.Description: select scan direction reverse or not.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel data.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel data.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Mono 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Mono 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB8Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to RGB 8 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV422_8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to YUV 422 YUYV Packed
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to YUV 422 YUYV Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV422_8_UYVY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to YUV 422 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to YUV 422 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV8_UYV
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to YUV 444 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to YUV 444 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV411_8_UYYVYY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to YUV411 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 10
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 10.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 10
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 10.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 10
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 10.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 10
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 10.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerBG 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGR 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerRG 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGB 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerBG 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGR 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerRG 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGB 12 Packed.

Enumeration.Name: ChannelCorrectMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select Channel Correct Mode
Enumeration.Description: Select Channel Correct Mode

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Size of a pixel in bits.
Enumeration.Description: Size of a pixel in bits.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the sensor`s test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor`s test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Black
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: White
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: VerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: ColorBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: MonoBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalColorBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with Horizontal Color Bar.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with Horizontal Color Bar.

EnumEntry.Name: ObliqueMonoBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with oblique stripes of color including White, Black..
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with oblique stripes of color including White, Black..

EnumEntry.Name: ObliqueColorBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with oblique stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow..
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with oblique stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow..

EnumEntry.Name: GradualMonoBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with gradual stripes of color including White, Black..
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with gradual stripes of color including White, Black..

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1 binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2 binning.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of vertical pixels to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of vertical pixels to combine together.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of Horizontal pixels to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of Horizontal pixels to combine together.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Enumeration.Name: Deinterlacing
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.
Enumeration.Description: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDuplication
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.

EnumEntry.Name: Weave
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.

Enumeration.Name: FrameSpecInfoSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the frame-specific information.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the frame-specific information.

Boolean.Name: FrameSpecInfo
Boolean.ToolTip: the frame-specific information.
Boolean.Description: the frame-specific information.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the Signal wait mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Select the Signal wait mode of the device.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Status of the selected acquisition signal.
Boolean.Description: Status of the selected acquisition signal.

Boolean.Name: FrameTimeoutEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the Frame Timeout.
Boolean.Description: Enables the Frame Timeout.

Integer.Name: FrameTimeoutTime
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the frame timeout in microseconds. When the timeout expires before a frame acquisition is complete, a partial frame will be delivered.
Integer.Description: Sets the frame timeout in microseconds. When the timeout expires before a frame acquisition is complete, a partial frame will be delivered.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.
Command.Description: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.
Boolean.Description: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: ResultingFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed frame acquisition rate (in frames per second) given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth
Float.Description: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate in frames per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate at which the Lines are captured.
Integer.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the Lines are captured.

Integer.Name: ResultingLineRate
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed Line acquisition rate (in Lines per second) given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth
Integer.Description: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate in Lines per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionLineRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables manual control of the camera Line rate.
Boolean.Description: Enables manual control of the camera Line rate.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames. The Acquisition is activated when the trigger signal becomes active and terminated when it goes back to the inactive state.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: LineStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Boolean.Name: TriggerCacheEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time in us when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Float.Description: Exposure time in us when Exposure Mode is Timed.

Enumeration.Name: GainShutPrior
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineModeInputAvailable_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: INDEX = 0 ? INQ0 : ( INDEX = 1 ? INQ1 : ( INDEX = 2 ? INQ2 : ( INDEX = 3 ? INQ3 : ( INDEX = 4 ? INQ4 : ( INDEX = 5 ? CC1 : ( INDEX = 6 ? CC2 : ( INDEX = 7 ? CC3 : CC4 ) ) )))))

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineModeOutputAvailable_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: INDEX = 0 ? INQ0 : ( INDEX = 1 ? INQ1 : ( INDEX = 2 ? INQ2 : ( INDEX = 3 ? INQ3 : ( INDEX = 4 ? INQ4 : CC1 ) ) ))

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected or output line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output line.

Boolean.Name: LineTermination
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the termination of the signal of the selected or output line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the termination of the signal of the selected input or output line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected line.

Boolean.Name: StrobeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the strobe signal to be output to the selected line.
Boolean.Description: Enables the strobe signal to be output to the selected line.

IntSwissKnife.Name: StrobeLineOnOffInq_Bit
IntSwissKnife.Formula: INDEX = 0 ? INQ0 : ( INDEX = 1 ? INQ1 : ( INDEX = 2 ? INQ2 : ( INDEX = 3 ? INQ3 : INQ4 ) ))

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit to be output to the selected line.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit to be output to the selected line.

Integer.Name: LineDebouncerTime
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected line debouncer time in us.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of the selected line debouncer time in us.

Integer.Name: StrobeLineDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Duration in us.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Duration in us.

Integer.Name: StrobeLineDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Delay in us.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Delay in us.

Integer.Name: StrobeLinePreDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line PreDelay in us.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line PreDelay in us.

Enumeration.Name: CounterSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Counter to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Counter to configure.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Acquisition Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Acquisition Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Acquisition Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Acquisition Start.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Acquisition End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Acquisition End.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Start Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Start Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Start.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame End.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Burst Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Burst Start.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Burst End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Burst End.

EnumEntry.Name: LineStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Line Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Line Start.

EnumEntry.Name: LineEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Line End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Line End.

EnumEntry.Name: CC1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: CC2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.

EnumEntry.Name: CC3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.

EnumEntry.Name: CC4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of transitions on the chosen CC Line.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets with the reception of a trigger on the CounterTriggerSource.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets with the reception of a trigger on the CounterTriggerSource.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets on the reception of the Software Signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets on the reception of the Software Signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets with the reception of the Frame Start Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets with the reception of the Frame Start Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets with the reception of the Frame Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets with the reception of the Frame Start.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active. CounterReset can be used to reset the Counter independently from the CounterResetSource. To disable the counter temporarily, set CounterEventSource to Off.

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.

Integer.Name: CounterCurrentValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter.

Integer.Name: CounterValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.

Boolean.Name: HueEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables hue adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables hue adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: HueAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic hue level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic hue level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.

Integer.Name: Hue
Integer.ToolTip: Hue of the image in degrees.
Integer.Description: Hue of the image in degrees.

Boolean.Name: NUCEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable the FPNC and PRNUC Control
Boolean.Description: Enable the FPNC and PRNUC Control

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.

Enumeration.Name: PreampGain
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Gain applied to the image in dB
Float.Description: Gain applied to the image in dB.

Float.Name: DigitalShift
Float.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected digital shift control
Float.Description: This value sets the selected digital shift control

Boolean.Name: DigitalShiftEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables DigitalShift adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables DigitalShift adjustment.

Integer.Name: Brightness
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected Brightness control
Integer.Description: This value sets the selected Brightness control

Boolean.Name: BlackLevelEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables black level adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables black level adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.

Integer.Name: BlackLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Analog black level in percent.
Integer.Description: Analog black level in percent.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Balance White Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart of the manual white balance feature.
Enumeration.Description: Balance White Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart of the manual white balance feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Balance White Auto function.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Balance White Auto function.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a balance ratio to configure. Once a balance ratio control has been selected.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a balance ratio to configure. Once a balance ratio control has been selected.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment.

Integer.Name: BalanceRatio
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected balance ratio control as an integer
Integer.Description: This value sets the selected balance ratio control as an integer.

Boolean.Name: SharpnessEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables sharpness adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables sharpness adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: SharpnessAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic sharpness adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic sharpness adjustment.

Integer.Name: Sharpness
Integer.ToolTip: Sharpness of the image.
Integer.Description: Sharpness of the image.

Boolean.Name: SaturationEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables saturation adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables saturation adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: SaturationAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic saturation adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic saturation adjustment.

Integer.Name: Saturation
Integer.ToolTip: Saturation of the image in percent
Integer.Description: Saturation of the image in percent.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.

Enumeration.Name: GammaSelector
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the type of gamma to apply.

EnumEntry.Name: User
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets gamma to user defined curve
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the the user configurable gamma curve.

EnumEntry.Name: sRGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets gamma to fixed sRGB curve.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the fixed sRGB gamma curve

Boolean.Name: GammaEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables gamma correction.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables gamma correction.

Integer.Name: FanOpenThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the Threshold of fan's switch.
Integer.Description: Sets the Threshold of fan's switch.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionAOIWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the width of the auto function area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the auto function area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionAOIHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the height of the auto function area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the auto function area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionAOIOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the starting column of the auto function area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the starting column of the auto function area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionAOIOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the starting line of the auto function area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the starting line of the auto function area of interest in pixels.

Boolean.Name: AutoFunctionAOIUsageWhiteBalance
Boolean.DisplayName: Auto Function AOI Usage White Balance

Boolean.Name: AutoFunctionAOIUsageRedLightCorrection
Boolean.DisplayName: Auto Function AOI Usage Red Light Correction

Enumeration.Name: AutoFunctionAOISelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Auto Function AOI.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Auto Function AOI.

EnumEntry.Name: AOI1
EnumEntry.Description: Auto Function AOI 1 is used by the Gain Auto and Exposure Auto functions.

EnumEntry.Name: AOI2
EnumEntry.Description: Auto Function AOI 2 is used by the Balance White Auto function.

Integer.Name: AutoExposureTimeLowerLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Lower limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter
Integer.Description: Lower limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter

Integer.Name: AutoExposureTimeUpperLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Upper limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter
Integer.Description: Upper limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter

Float.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Lower limit of the Auto Gain parameter
Float.Description: Lower limit of the Auto Gain parameter

Float.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Upper limit of the Auto Gain parameter
Float.Description: Upper limit of the Auto Gain parameter

Command.Name: ClampLevelSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the clamplevel table into flash
Command.Description: Save the clamplevel table into flash

Command.Name: UCCValueSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the UCC table into flash
Command.Description: Save the UCC table into flash

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which LUT to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.ToolTip: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.
Register.Description: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Encoder to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Encoder to configure.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSourceA
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line0.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line0.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line1.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line1.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line2.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line2.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line3.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line3.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSourceB
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line0.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line0.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line1.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line1.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line2.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line2.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line3.
EnumEntry.Description: Encoder Forward input is taken from Line3.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderOutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This enumeration value selects the circumstances for the shaft encoder module to output trigger signals.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration value selects the circumstances for the shaft encoder module to output trigger signals.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyDirection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.

EnumEntry.Name: ForwardOnly
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderCounterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the counting mode of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the counting mode of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.

EnumEntry.Name: IgnoreDirection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.

EnumEntry.Name: FollowDirection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.

Integer.Name: EncoderCounter
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value (read only) indicates the current value of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value (read only) indicates the current value of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.

Command.Name: EncoderCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the tick counter count of the shaft encoder module to 0.
Command.Description: This command resets the tick counter count of the shaft encoder module to 0.

Command.Name: EncoderReverseCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module to 0 and informs the module that the current direction of conveyor movement is forward. Reset must be carried out before the first conveyor movement in the forward direction.
Command.Description: This command resets the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module to 0 and informs the module that the current direction of conveyor movement is forward. Reset must be carried out before the first conveyor movement in the forward direction.

Integer.Name: EncoderCounterMax
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value sets the maximum value for the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the maximum value for the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.

Integer.Name: EncoderMaxReverseCounter
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value sets the maximum value for the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the maximum value for the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module.

Integer.Name: PreDivider
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the pre-divider value for the pre-divider sub-module.
Integer.Description: Sets the pre-divider value for the pre-divider sub-module.

Integer.Name: Multiplier
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the multiplier value for the multiplier sub-module.
Integer.Description: Sets the multiplier value for the multiplier sub-module.

Integer.Name: PostDivider
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the PostDivider value for the PostDivider sub-module.
Integer.Description: Sets the PostDivider value for the PostDivider sub-module.

Enumeration.Name: InputSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the input source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the input source.

Enumeration.Name: SignalAlignment
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signal transition relationships between received and generated signals.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signal transition relationships between received and generated signals.

Boolean.Name: PreventOvertrigger
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables overtriggering protection.
Boolean.Description: Enables overtriggering protection.

StructReg.Comment: Default Shading Set Selector Inquiry Register

Enumeration.Name: ShadingSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the kind of shading correction.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the kind of shading correction.

Enumeration.Name: DefaultShadingSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the bootup shading set.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the bootup shading set.

Enumeration.Name: ShadingSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the shading set to which the activate command will be applied.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the shading set to which the activate command will be applied.

Enumeration.Name: ShadingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates error statuses related to shading correction.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates error statuses related to shading correction.

Enumeration.Name: CreateShadingSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Creates a shading set.
Enumeration.Description: Creates a shading set.

Boolean.Name: ShadingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected kind of shading correction.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected kind of shading correction.

Integer.Name: UserSetCurrent
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the user set that is currently in use.
Integer.Description: Indicates the user set that is currently in use. At initialization time, the camera loads the most recently saved user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the selected configuration into the camera's volatile memory and makes it the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.
Command.Description: This command loads the selected configuration set from the non-volatile memory in the camera to the volatile memory and makes the selected set the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the current active configuration set into the selected user set.
Command.Description: This command copies the parameters in the current active configuration set into the selected user set in the camera's non-volatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the configuration set to load, save, or configure. Once a configuration set has been selected, all changes to the configuration set settings will be applied to the selected configuration set.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the configuration set to load, save or configure. Possible values for the User Set Selector are: Default: Selects a configuration set that contains factory settings. User Set 1: Selects the first user set. When the Default configuration set is selected and loaded using User Set Load, the device must be in default factory settings state and must make sure the mandatory continuous acquisition use case works directly. Default User Set is read-only and cannot be modified.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the default configuration set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 2.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 3.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the default user set as the default startup set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the default user set as the default startup set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user set 1 as the default startup set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets user set 1 as the default startup set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user set 2 as the default startup set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets user set 2 as the default startup set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user set 3 as the default startup set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets user set 3 as the default startup set.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Integer.Name: SupportedBaudrates
Integer.ToolTip: Supported Baudrates of Serial.
Integer.Description: Supported Baudrates of Serial.

Enumeration.Name: CurrentBaudrate
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current Baudrate of Serial.
Enumeration.Description: Current Baudrate of Serial.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way

Enumeration.Name: ClConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera. It helps especially when a camera is capable of operation in a non-standard configuration, and when the features PixelSize, SensorDigitizationTaps, and DeviceTapGeometry do not provide enough information for interpretation of the image data provided by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Base
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Medium
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Full
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: DualBase
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The camera streams the data from multiple taps (that do not fit in the standard base configuration) through two Camera Link base ports.
EnumEntry.Description: The camera streams the data from multiple taps (that do not fit in the standard base configuration) through two Camera Link base ports. It is responsibility of the application or frame grabber to reconstruct the full image. Only one of the ports (fixed) serves as the "master" for serial communication and triggering.

EnumEntry.Name: EightyBit
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard 80-bit configuration with 10 taps of 8 bits or 8 taps of 10 bits, as described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard 80-bit configuration with 10 taps of 8 bits or 8 taps of 10 bits, as described by the Camera Link standard.

Enumeration.Name: ClTimeSlotsCount
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.
